story.text: Jan 3 Billing software company Amdocs Ltd. DOX.N said it would buy Israeli start-up SigValue Technologies Inc. for about $54 million in cash. The company said it expects the acquisition to be dilutive in fiscal 2007. Amdocs currently owns 14 percent of SigValue's capital stock. Amdocs said the acquisition price is net of cash on hand. (Reporting by Dhanya Skariachan in Bangalore)
story.title: amdocs to acquire israel ' s sigvalue for $ 54 mln
